It's my "everything reuseable things" toolbox. The units to be used in your projects can be found in the "src" folder. Some features are explained on my blog or have been coded live on Twitch. Examples of use in the form of VCL or FireMonkey projects are available in the "samples" subfolder. *************************************************************************** Author(s) : Patrick PREMARTIN Site : https://developpeur-pascal.fr/librairies-publiques.html Project site : https://github.com/DeveloppeurPascal/librairies *************************************************************************** File last update : 28/05/2024 12:19:15 Signature : 09cad8d9b4796d5bc9d0b29b5d7119b47c06550e ***************************************************************************
